title: Who is DJ? What is his work? - Quora

response.answer_text: A DJ is basically an Individual who plays different songs in the clubs and parties and festivals and unlike a normal pause and play, he mixes different tracks and effects and creates different vibes for the crowd so that the crowd enjoys each and every moment of his play, And if you’re talking about the DJs that are taking over the EDM industry then you should know almost all are DJs and Producer at the same time. So they produce tracks on their select genre and mixes them with melodies and other stuff they like and release their tracks and when you see those people in big festivals like Sunburn, EDC, Tommorowland , then they mix their own songs combined with all other DJs songs. And the definition of a DJ and Producer varies with each Individual DJ and Producer as there are a lot of things involved while making music.

A DJ is a Disc Jockey and they mix more than two songs at a time. They know how to play with the beats, they know about the bpm and how to mix two songs of different bpm. they know what public want to hear. That's it.
